item.title: June --- Quote of the Month: -----------------" Any fool can have a child. That doesn't make you a Father. It is the courage to Raise a child that makes you a Father! Happy Father's Day to all of the Fathers, Stepdads, Papas, Grandfathers, Godfathers, Foster dads, Uncles and any other men who acted as positive role models in a child's life. It takes a village to raise a child and we Honor and Thank the Men of that village this month! "
Kodi Box Maintenance: Be sure to close out of all of your apps when they are not in use. Once a month, unplug the power to your modem for 2 minutes and plug back in to help with buffering issues.
------ Feel free to call or text us on our New Business number (704) 705-7033 with any questions.-------
